pages.text: Many changes are made to basic vanilla behaviours in the $(thing)Crucial 2$() modpack to make gameplay more fun. This entry will quickly info-dump a few of the more relevant ones you may wish to know about.$(br2)Keep in mind this is not an exhaustive list, and you're bound to find more as you play!

pages.title: Big Stone Clusters
pages.text: Stones like $(item)Andesite$() will now generate in big clusters.$(br2)Different stones will generate in different biomes, so check $(item)JEI$() for where to find them.

pages.title: Campfire Boost
pages.text: Flying with an $(item)Elytra$() over a $(item)Campfire$() with a $(item)Hay Bale$() underneath will give you a quick altitude boost.$(br2)$(item)Soul Camprfires$() have the inverse effect.

pages.title: Carpeted Stairs
pages.text: Right clicking $(item)Carpet$() or $(item)Snow$() onto any type of stairs will attach the carpet or snow to them.

pages.title: Chain Features
pages.text: $(item)Chains$() can now be used to link together $(thing)Boats$() and $(thing)Minecarts$().$(br2)When moved by $(item)Pistons$(), they can also connect multiple blocks together if placed between them.

pages.title: Compass Everywhere
pages.text: $(item)Compasses$() can now be used in the $(thing)Nether$() and $()End$(). They'll point to either the portal you came in from, in the $(thing)Nether$(), or the portal to leave, in the $(thing)End$().

pages.title: Customizable Bed
pages.text: $(item)Beds$() can now be customized with $(item)Banners$(), so you can further decorate your living space.

pages.title: Customizable Elytra
pages.text: The $(item)Elytra$() can now be dyed just like leather armor, and you can even attach $(item)Banners$() to it, much like you would for a shield.

pages.title: Dirt to Path
pages.text: You can now create $(item)Grass Path$() with $(item)Dirt$(). Further right clicking with any $(item)Hoe$() produces $(item)Shallow Dirt$(), which can be waterlogged.$(br2)Paths are also available for other grassy style blocks.

pages.title: Dispenser Block Placing
pages.text: $(item)Dispensers$() can now place any block. The blocks are placed with the correct orientation too.

pages.title: Hoe Harvesting
pages.text: $(item)Hoes$() can now be used to break a 3x3 area of vegetation. $(item)Diamond and Netherite Hoes$() can break a 5x5 instead.$(br2)Additionally, you can right click a crop to harvest and replant it; using a $(item)Hoe$() harvests the respective area.

pages.title: Improved Ladders
pages.text: $(item)Ladders$() can now be dropped down by right clicking a placed ladder with another one.$(br2)You can also slide down quickly by looking down.

pages.title: Piston Buffs
pages.text: $(item)Pistons$() can now move twice as many blocks, up to 24. They also get the ability to move complex blocks known as $(thing)Tile Entities$() (e.g. $(item)Chests$(), $(item)Furnaces$(), etc).$(br2)If you need an immovable block, try $(item)Sturdy Stone$().

pages.title: Pot All The Things!
pages.text: $(item)Flower Pots$() can now hold a ton more flowers and crops, vanilla or otherwise.$(br2)You can also hang them from the ceiling, or from $(item)Chains$().

pages.title: Shield Enchanting
pages.text: $(item)Shields$() can now be enchanted like any other item. The enchantments are all derived from vanilla ones, and are self-explanatory.

pages.title: Villager Herding
pages.text: $(thing)Villagers$() will now follow players holding $(item)Emerald Blocks$(), making it easier to move them around.

pages.title: Wall Lanterns
pages.text: $(thing)Lanterns$() can now be placed hanging from walls, rather than just ceilings. You can also hang them from $(item)Wooden Posts$(), alongside $(item)Chains$().

pages.title: Windowlogging
pages.text: You can now add $(item)Panes$(), glass or otherwise to any $(item)Slabs, Stairs, Fences, or Walls$() - simply right click with the pane style block you want onto an already placed block to merge them together.
